title: Looking for rank 5 players. Plat and higher.
body:
Hello, since it's a new season I'm looking to get into the competitive scene, so I'll be needing four other players to join my rank 5 team.

The requirements are:
Ready to learn a champion for the team
Commitment
Good communication skills
Positive attitude

If you're interested in joining simply give me your:

IGN
Rank
Age
Whether or not you have a mic. and skype/curse
Champion pool
Position

replies.body: Ok, I'm assembling all who want to be in the team today.

IGN Captain Gok
Rank plat 2
Age 19
Whether or not you have a mic. and skype/curse  yeah all and teamspeak server
Champion pool can play anything that fits comp and like most champs
Position anything but support preferred

NRG Nemesis
Gold 3
16
Have everything
Can Play any role Sufficiently and a lot of champs in every role.
Main Adc atm: {{champion:67}} /{{champion:236}} /{{champion:42}} /{{champion:104}} /{{champion:51}} /{{champion:18}} /{{champion:81}} 
In my old team I've beaten diamond/master bot lanes

Hodor The Giant
Plat 4
17
Skype and all
Jungle main, but can support/adc
Main junglers atm: Vi, J4, Elise, Kha'zix, Amumu.

IGN: oneweek
Rank Plat 4
Age 23
Whether or not you have a mic. and skype/curse: all of them
Champion pool: all adc's except quinn urgot and ashe, 
mid lanners: syndra, zed, talon, jayce, ori, ziggs, happy to learn others 
Position Adc/ mid

Bengi 
Gold 4 (Was plat 2 but decayed due to long term relationship) 
20
Have mic and both skype and curse
Syndra/Lux/Ahri/Zed/Yasuo - Janna/Thresh/Leona
Mid/Support

IGN : NightFight
Rank Currently Platinum IV
Age : 20
Whether or not you have a mic. and Skype / Curse : I have all of the above
Champion pool : I own all champs and know mechanics well on most
Position : Main Adc and i'm more than decent in the top lane
I mainly play {{champion:222}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:51}}  however I play every adc fairly frequently and can comfortably play each with the right mechanics

I should also note that I would be gone over Christmas and new years but return on the 13th of jan ready to play.
